title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 36 - Gear And Operation of Gear

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 36.1 - Nets, set and trap lines, eel weirs and eel pots
§ 36.2 - Commercial fishing in lake erie and lake ontario
§ 36.3 - Commercial fishing in the hudson river
